metadata.description: Distribution accelerator for international asset managers. Connect your offering to local and institutional distributors with a selective and independent approach. AFTPM Member.

meta.title: Institutional Distribution Partnerships | Alforis TPM
meta.description: Let's build your distribution strategy across 4 European markets together. Partnership-driven, selective and transparent approach.

hero.title: Let's build your European growth together
hero.subtitle: A selective TPM partner for sustainable growth
hero.intro: You're looking for more than a one-off distributor. You want a partner who understands your DNA, faithfully represents your investment approach, and commits for the long term. That's exactly what we offer.

selectivity.title: Deliberate selectivity
selectivity.desc: Maximum 3-5 simultaneous mandates. We refuse dispersion to guarantee quality and depth for each partner.

alignment.title: Strategic alignment
alignment.desc: Multi-year contracts with shared objectives, clear governance and transparent reporting. We succeed together.

independence.title: Total independence
independence.desc: No banking shareholders. Our recommendations are guided by one priority only: our partners' success.

ideal.title: Our ideal partners
ideal.subtitle: With whom do we build lasting relationships?

boutiques.title: International asset management boutiques
boutiques.desc: Between €200M and €5bn in assets, with a differentiating investment philosophy and solid track record. You're looking to diversify your investor base in Southern Europe.

specialists.title: Thematic specialists
specialists.desc: Focused managers (sector equity, specialized credit, alternative strategies) seeking institutional investor access in French-speaking markets without diluting their positioning.

emerging.title: Ambitious emerging players
emerging.desc: Recently spun-off teams or new entrants with a compelling proposition, ready to invest in a long-term relationship to build their European presence.

engagement.title: Our partnership engagement model
engagement.subtitle: A structured relationship over 24-36 months in 3 phases

foundation.title: Foundations & strategic alignment
foundation.objectives: In-depth diagnostic, market positioning, commercial preparation
deliverables: Complete audit of your offering and documentation (SFDR/MiFID II compliance)
Decision-maker mapping of 30-50 priority target accounts
Localized storytelling by market (FR/ES/PT) and segment
24-month distribution roadmap with quarterly milestones

acceleration.title: Accelerated commercial development
acceleration.objectives: Market penetration, pipeline building, first mandates
deliverables: ≥ 60 qualified meetings with institutional decision-makers
Thematic roadshow hosting (3-4 per year)
Due diligence and listing process management
First institutional mandates and/or platform listings

maturity.title: Consolidation & sustainable growth
deliverables: Extension to new segments (family offices, private banks)
Product launch support in our markets
Progressive skills transfer to your internal teams
Annual review and strategic adjustment

practices.title: Monthly governance
practices.desc: Strategic checkpoint with your teams: pipeline review, market feedback, tactical adjustments, next month preparation.

practices.title: Real-time shared CRM
practices.desc: Full visibility on every interaction, meeting reports, opportunity status. You stay in control.

practices.title: Structured reporting
practices.desc: Quarterly dashboard: commercial KPIs, qualitative market feedback analysis, adjustment recommendations.

practices.title: Continuous co-construction
practices.desc: We're not mere executors. Every strategy is co-built, challenged and refined together.

results.title: Expected results over 24 months
results.subtitle: Concrete milestones to measure our joint impact
milestones: 6-10 new institutional partners (private banks, family offices, insurers)
€30-80M additional AUM depending on your positioning and capacity
Established and credible presence in 3-4 strategic markets
Internal team trained and able to continue development

cases.title: Ongoing partnerships
cases.subtitle: Examples of lasting collaborations (details under NDA)

items.challenge: Zero institutional presence in Southern Europe, unstructured sales process
items.approach: 36-month partnership with full support: storytelling repositioning, SFDR documentation, targeted roadshows
items.results: 18 months: €55M raised from 7 institutions, €120M pipeline, commercial team trained

items.challenge: Complex strategy, difficult to explain, need to penetrate French institutional market
items.approach: Co-constructed simplified narrative, selective focus on 15 large institutional accounts
items.results: 24 months: 3 institutional mandates (€85M), established presence, advanced discussions with 4 others

retainer.title: Monthly retainer
retainer.desc: Covers operational costs (travel, marketing, infrastructure). Minimum 12-month commitment.

success.title: Success fee
success.desc: Compensation on assets raised and/or mandates won. Tailored details based on your economic model.

model.note: We favor long-term partnerships (24-36 months) to build lasting results. No one-off assignments < 12 months.

items.q: How many partners do you manage simultaneously?
items.a: Maximum 5 active mandates. Currently, we have 2 available slots for 2025. This selectivity guarantees quality and availability.

items.q: What is the minimum commitment period?
items.a: 12 months minimum, but our best results come over 24-36 months. Institutional distribution is a marathon, not a sprint.

items.q: Do you work on geographic exclusivity?
items.a: Yes, in our 4 markets (FR/ES/PT/LU). You can have other TPM partners elsewhere in Europe, but we are your sole representative in our zone.
Track record ≥ 3 years, AUM ≥ €200M, clear investment philosophy, stable team, willingness to invest in the relationship. We decline 70% of requests.

cta.subtitle: Let's start with a 45-minute exploratory conversation
cta.process: We discuss your objectives, assess mutual alignment, and determine if a partnership makes sense for both parties.

meta.title: Become a distribution partner | Alforis TPM
meta.description: Join the asset managers we represent. Selectivity, strategic alignment and transparency for lasting collaboration.

hero.title: Join the 3 to 5 asset managers we represent per market
hero.subtitle: Selectivity, alignment, transparency: the Alforis TPM signature
hero.intro: We're not an opportunistic distributor stacking mandates. We build lasting partnerships with a handful of carefully selected asset managers.

philosophy.title: Our partnership philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: We favor lasting relationships, not stacked mandates

selectivity.title: Deliberate selectivity
selectivity.desc: Maximum 3-5 simultaneous mandates per market. This voluntary limitation guarantees genuine strategic focus and unwavering attention to each partner.

alignment.title: Strategic alignment
alignment.desc: We work exclusively with firms whose investment philosophy we understand and share. No 'catalog' representation.

independence.title: Total independence
independence.desc: No banking shareholders, no distribution bias. Our only priority: our partners' commercial success in our markets.

philosophy.quote: « Working with Alforis means being chosen, not simply represented. »

eligibility.title: Eligibility criteria
eligibility.subtitle: The fundamentals for successful collaboration

ucits.title: Registered UCITS or AIFM funds
ucits.desc: Your structure must be regulated (UCITS V, AIFMD) with authorization to market in Europe. We support compliance setup if needed.

aum.title: Minimum €100M AUM
aum.desc: Indicative threshold ensuring solid operational structure. Exceptions possible for spin-offs from recognized teams or highly differentiating strategies.

philosophy.title: Clear investment thesis
philosophy.desc: Differentiating philosophy, demonstrable track record, explainable investment process. We refuse 'me-too' products without added value.

marketing.title: Marketing & compliance support available
marketing.desc: Product documentation (factsheets, KIID/KID, SFDR), investor presentations, due diligence materials. We help with local adaptation but don't start from scratch.

commitment.title: Long-term commitment (>12 months)
commitment.desc: Institutional distribution is a marathon. We seek partners ready to invest in a multi-year relationship, not opportunistic 6-month mandates.

eligibility.note: Note: These criteria are indicative. Each application is evaluated individually. We decline approximately 70% of requests to guarantee the quality of our support.

onboarding.title: Onboarding process
onboarding.subtitle: From application to commercial launch: 6 to 8 weeks

initial.title: Initial confidential discussion
initial.desc: 45-minute exploratory call to understand your objectives, validate mutual alignment, present our approach.

review.title: Marketing materials review
review.desc: Audit of your materials (factsheets, presentations, track record). Identification of necessary adaptations for our markets.

compliance.title: Compliance & AFTPM validation
compliance.desc: Verification of European passports, SFDR/MiFID II compliance, AFTPM code adherence. Mutual due diligence.

contract.title: TPM contract signature
contract.desc: Finalization of commercial terms (retainer, success fee, geographic exclusivity), distribution mandate signature.

launch.title: Market plan launch
launch.desc: Target mapping, roadshow planning, CRM integration, first institutional meetings. Let's go!

testimonial.title: They trusted us
testimonial.subtitle: Testimonials from current partners
testimonial.quote: In 18 months, our Alforis representative opened 7 institutional doors in Spain and Portugal, of which 4 resulted in mandates. Their market knowledge and selective approach make all the difference.
testimonial.author: Equity Boutique (UK)

cta.title: Ready to apply?
cta.subtitle: Let's start with a 45-minute exploratory discussion
cta.description: Together we evaluate strategic alignment and determine if a partnership makes sense for both parties.

process.title: What you can expect from the first discussion:
steps: Presentation of your asset management firm and distribution objectives
Assessment of fit with our approach and markets
Frank discussion about mutual expectations and economic model
Next steps if alignment confirmed (or transparent feedback if mismatch)
